data.title: CRITICAL: Add thread safety to GoT graph operations
data.description:
GoT in-memory graph is NOT thread-safe. Risk: parallel agents could corrupt graph state. 

CURRENT STATE:
- File writes: SAFE (atomic_append)
- Event log: SAFE (append-only, unique session files)
- In-memory graph: UNSAFE (no locks)

MITIGATION NEEDED:
1. Add threading.RLock to GoTProjectManager
2. Wrap all graph mutations in lock context
3. Document thread safety guarantees

WORKAROUND (current): Sub-agents run as separate processes with own memory. Risk is low but not zero.
